aboutpara:
Hi, I'm Johnas Chami, a Data & Analytics Engineer and founder of HakunaMatata AI, where we help startups and SMEs navigate data, AI, and digital transformation.

With experience spanning hospitality, healthcare, industrial, and tech sectors, I've worked with industry leaders like Microsoft, Cloudflare, and international businesses such as AAPI, Leiria. My diverse background has shaped my expertise in data-driven solutions and business strategy.

Beyond work, I enjoy playing football, DJing, cooking, hiking, and spending time with friends and family. I speak English, Swahili, Turkish, and Portuguese, and my core values are empathy, care, and leadership over bossing, these define my approach to work and life.

If you're cool enough, you can even volunteer to be my swimming coach! ðŸ˜†

experiences.bullets: Market Research Analyst (Ipsos Tanzania), Associate Business Manager (Tulivu hospitality Tanzania), Health Insurance Pricing and Market intern (Anadolu Sigorta Turkey), Football Player (TFF Turkey), Events Manager (Tours Portugal)
